√edh 'thrive'

present: [1.] édhate etc. V.+  édhati etc. B.+  

perfect: edhire   -- edhā́ṃ  cakrire  edhām  babhūvire  

aorist: [3.] aididhat   -- [5.] edhiṣīyá etc.  

[future: edhiṣyate  edhitā  ]

verbal: edhita E.+  édhitum B.+  

secondary: desiderative: edidhiṣa-  in  d.   -- causative: edhayati etc. S.+  

derivatives: -edha?  edhatú V.B.  -edhana R.  edhas S.E.  edidhiṣu- VS.  

Perhaps related with rdh.
